title: Langtang Valley Trek
overview: A close-to-Kathmandu Himalayan trek with mountain views, Tamang culture, and classic teahouse stays.
Steady trail progression to Kyanjin Gompa with optional high viewpoints like Kyanjin Ri.
Great option for trekkers who want a full Nepal mountain experience without Lukla flights.
